result.reason: Enhance existing VNC auto-reconnect functionality to improve robustness and user experience.
result.approach: Refactor and expand the existing auto-reconnect logic within ProtocolVNC.cs, possibly introducing new configuration options in AdvancedPage.cs for finer control over reconnect attempts and delays. Investigate the current reconnect strategy and improve its reliability.
